arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Finally Polveelo! We are ready to challenge the Evil Nezle!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Yes Sirena! Time for us to save all life, universe and everything!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Yes! THIS WILL BE OUR LAST BATTLE!!!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Don't forget Sirena, use arrows to move your ship and Z to shoot!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: I know that already, I flew all the way here, Polveelo!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! Sirena, I see you have found me... Welcome to die!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: We did it Sirena! WE DID IT!!!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Yes my friend! I wonder if the universe can be at peace now...

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Huzzah Polveelo! We DEFEATED!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Hooray! The Evil Nezle has been destroyed!!!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: That was a tough one Polveelo, but it's all over now!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Oh Sirena, what a fight! But we won!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Is it over Polveelo? Did we beat him?

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Sensors show the evil ship was destroyed! Victory is ours!!!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: You know Polveelo... I have a bad feeling about this...

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: I wonder if the Evil Nezle is finally gone too Sirena...

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Sirena! Sirena! You did it!!!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: We won! We are living proof that good always wins!!!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Are we safe Polveelo? Is it over?

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: I can't really see through all those space explosions Sirena...

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: The Evil Nezle is no more! Finally, we achieved victory Sirena!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Wait Polveelo... Sensors are picking something up...

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Excelent work, Sirena! Polveelo out!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! You destroyed another toy, but this isn't even my last form!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! You think you won, but you just activated my trap card!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! I was only using 60% of my real Power!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! This was but a scratch! My next ship will destroy you!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! Is that all you got?? Take this!!!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! This wasn't even the real me!!! Prepare yourself Sirena!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! I lost my script... But here's another ship!!!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! You have no chance to survive, make your time! KATS!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: HA! Luckily, my engineers just finished this new Ship!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: NOT SO FAST!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: BUT HOW? This ship's power was over 9000! I'll use a better one...

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: NOW SIRENA! It's our chance! Fly into the ship's mouth, so we can destroy it from the inside!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Keep at it Sirena! I see his ship breaking!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Keep shooting Sirena! Sensors show heavy damage being dealt!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: SHOOT! SHOOT MORE! I mean.. Nice shot Sirena!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: HAHAHAHA DIE NEZLE!! I mean.. Hooray Sirena!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Nice one Sirena! Right in his pancreas!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Wow! Nice shot!! At this pace, he has no chance!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Chargin more guns Sirena! Let's blow him up!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: I didn't know we were this strong! Keep at it!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: OUCH! What is this? You're using real bullets!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: I should have installed better shields!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: Hey, dont shoot that! I SAID DON'T!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: You just shot my videogames! You shall pay!!!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: My mother's vase! She's gonna be so mad!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: Computer's fried.. But I never liked it anyway!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: Hey! That's not fair, I can't dodge that!!!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: ARGH! My pancreas!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: OUCH! My kneecaps!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: UGHH! My EARS!

arDialogs.speaker: n
arDialogs.text: Nezle: ERGH! My left kidney!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: HA! Take this Nezle!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Another great hit! For Great Justice!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: BOOM! Take that!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Your evil is no good here Nezle! Take this!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: PEW PEW! C'mon Polveelo, let's get him!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: CHARGING MY LASERS! HAAA!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: More Rockets Polveelo! We're doing some good damage!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Huzzah! Right on his Kidney! Let's keep shooting!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Power the guns Polveelo! Send out every Zig!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Lok'tar Ogar! Victory or Death!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: This is fun! PEW PEW PEW PEW!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Oh no!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: Argh!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: EW!

arDialogs.speaker: p
arDialogs.text: Polveelo: UGH!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Oh no!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: Argh!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: EW!

arDialogs.speaker: s
arDialogs.text: Sirena: UGH!
